MED_CVG_USERACTION.name: MED_CVG_USERACTION
MED_CVG_USERACTION.description: This table holds information about user actions taken on Patient Estimates.

columns.name: MED_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the medication estimate record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: UAC_EMP_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user (EMP) record ID of the user who either selects a medication alternative or keeps the original one in Patient Estimates.

columns.name: UAC_EMP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: UAC_SEL_ALT_YN
columns.description: Store whether user selects alternative medication from this LME.

columns.name: UAC_INS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant (date and time in UTC) a user selected an alternative medication from this LME.
